Class Map

java.lang.Object
  Map

public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

map will create a 2d array that will store values as to what is contained there this physically represents a map in 2d space Code for tiles 0 - null 1 - nothing 2 - forest 3 - castle

Version:
2018-02-26
Author:
Frank Lai
